meanings.definition: Not able to be reconciled or resolved.
meanings.sent1: Their unreconcilable opinions led to constant arguments.
meanings.sent2: The two friends had an unreconcilable disagreement about the movie.
meanings.sent3: It was quite unreconcilable how they both wanted to sit in the same chair.
meanings.sent4: The clash of their unreconcilable personalities created tension in the group.
meanings.sent5: The irreconcilable colors clashed in an unreconcilable way.

meanings.definition: Unable to be made compatible or consistent.
meanings.sent1: The software update caused unreconcilable errors in the system.
meanings.sent2: Their schedules were unreconcilable, making it hard to meet up.
meanings.sent3: It was unreconcilable how the puzzle pieces just wouldn't fit together.
meanings.sent4: The unreconcilable mix of flavors left a strange taste in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The unreconcilable sizes of the shoes made it impossible to wear them.

meanings.sent1: Their unreconcilable caused the breakup of their relationship.
meanings.sent2: The unreconcilable between the two teams led to a stalemate.
meanings.sent3: The unreconcilable in tastes made it hard to choose a restaurant.
meanings.sent4: The unreconcilable in their goals made collaboration impossible.
meanings.sent5: The unreconcilable in their beliefs created a divide between them.
